snippet: The photographer and filmmaker Henry Chalfant, known for documenting graffiti from the 1970s, is keeping the controversial visual form alive with interactive iBooks.
lead_paragraph: The photographer and filmmaker Henry Chalfant, known for documenting graffiti from the 1970s, is keeping the controversial visual form alive with interactive iBooks.

headline.seo: Henry Chalfant’s Shots of Subway Graffiti Go Digital
headline.main: Subway Graffiti in the Digital Age
